directions.step:
Get the ready made pancake batter mix and mix it with enough water to make a thick batter. Slice the zucchini about 1/8 thick. Heat the oil to hot but not smoking, Dip each slice of zucchini in the batter and fry until golden on each side, salt while you drain. Make 2 times what you need because they will be eaten as you fry. Posted to MM-Recipes Digest V3 #335
